resources.string: This is a simple app to read various tags (NDEF, RFID, FeliCa, ISO 14443, etc).\n\nYou can use it as you wish.
If there\'s any error during the execution please, notify me to: luisalfonsocb83@gmail.com or made a branch in: https://github.com/UNI-Developers/Android_Workship\n\n/Crdzbird Android Developer.
No NFC found on this device
NFC is not enabled. Please go to the wireless settings to enable it.
